column5: Took a run up to the cottage for a look. Surprised to see the bottoms of Scugog and Pigeon froze over. Gannon Narrows and north Pigeon still wide open You hard water guys must be getting the tingles.  ?
Good thing about north Pigeon...got a buddy heading there tomorrow! Then again wouldn't be the first time we used the boat as an icebreaker to get to some late season musky fishing
